title: NFT-Craze Android iOS Light Wallet
description: Cardano needs a new advanced mobile light wallet that is performant, handles NFTs properly and can manage accounts with many native assets.
solution: Use flutter to build a cross-platform Android and iOS light wallet that has a clean user interface while providing top performance.
experience: NFT-Craze Gallery, the only mobile CNFT viewer. Offering vending machine services for artists. Mobile consultant for large financial LLCs.
